alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:35AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Van Zandt County through 815 AM CDT... At 735 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Purtis Creek State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Canton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, Grand Saline, Van, Fruitvale, Purtis Creek State Park, Myrtle Springs, Ben Wheeler, Whitton, Phalba, Roddy, Jackson, Oakland, Walton, Jones, Pruitt, Tundra, Martins Mill, Colfax, Primrose and Wise. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 522 and 542. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
